name: Gravity Maze (itch) (InterstellarDragonDev)
description:
This is a game about using the power of the moons gravity to navigate a maze.

The moon orbits every 10 seconds and this is how the '10 second' limitation is integrated into the game.

The game was made in the Godot game engine. All assets are from somewhere on the internet.

It's not the most complicated game in the world but I only had like 1 day available to make it so this is the best I could do.

Enjoy my little creation

p.s if you download then you get the joy of playing a game at 4000fps on your 60hz screen (probably) ;)
